Traps.Name: Magic Missiles
Traps.Description: Magic missiles shoot from a statue or object.

Traps.Name: Collapsing Stair
Traps.Description: Creates a ramp that deposits characters into a pit at its lower end.

Traps.Name: Falling Ceiling
Traps.Description: Ceiling block falls , or entire ceiling collapses.

Traps.Name: Crushing Ceiling
Traps.Description: Ceiling lowers slowly in locked room.

Traps.Name: Floor Chute
Traps.Description: Chute opens in floor.

Traps.Name: Loud Alarms
Traps.Description: Clanging noise attracts nearby monsters.

Traps.Name: Disintegrate
Traps.Description: Touching an object triggers a disintegrate spell.

Traps.Name: Poisoned Item
Traps.Description: Door or other object is coated with contact poison.

Traps.Name: Flame Trap
Traps.Description: Fire shoots out from wall, floor, or object.

Traps.Name: Flesh to Stone
Traps.Description: An object triggers a flesh to stone spell.

Traps.Name: Floor Trap
Traps.Description: Floor collapses or is an illusion.

Traps.Name: Venting Gas
Traps.Description: Blinding, acidic, obscuring, paralyzing, poisonous, or sleep-inducing gas.

Traps.Name: Electric Floor
Traps.Description: Floor tiles are electrified.

Traps.Name: Glyph of Warding
Traps.Description: Glyph of Warding spell upon place or item.

Traps.Name: Rolling Statue
Traps.Description: Huge wheeled statue rolls down corridor.

Traps.Name: Lightning Trap
Traps.Description: Lightning bolt shoots from wall or object.

Traps.Name: Flooded Room
Traps.Description: Locked room floods with water or acid.

Traps.Name: Trapped Chest
Traps.Description: Darts shoot out of a chest.

Traps.Name: Animated Object
Traps.Description: A weapon, suit of armor, or rug animates and attacks

Traps.Name: Pendulum Trap
Traps.Description: Pendulum , either bladed or weighted as a maul, swings across the room or hall.

Traps.Name: Ooze Pit Trap
Traps.Description: Hidden pit opens under foot

Traps.Name: Burning Pit Trap
Traps.Description: Hidden pit floods with acid or fire.

Traps.Name: Flooded Pit
Traps.Description: Locking pit floods with water.

Traps.Name: Scythe Trap
Traps.Description: Scything blade emerges from wall or object.

Traps.Name: Spear Trap
Traps.Description: Spears spring out from walls and floor.

Traps.Name: Brittle Stairs
Traps.Description: Brittle stairs collapse over spikes.

Traps.Name: Thunderwave
Traps.Description: Thunderwave spell knocks characters into a pit or spikes.

Traps.Name: Trap Jaws
Traps.Description: Steel or stone jaws restrain a character.

Traps.Name: Sliding Stone
Traps.Description: Stone block smashes across hallway.

Traps.Name: Symbol
Traps.Description: A Symbol Spell is inscribed in this room.

Traps.Name: Sliding Walls
Traps.Description: Walls slide together.
